description: The Gauntlet provided by the Pioneer Association for the far walkers, with bright colors, not easy to lose, hard texture can cope with various extreme environments for a long time, and is very popular among the explorer group.
ranks: When Resonance Skill is released, restores Resonance Energy by 8. This effect can be triggered 1 time(s) every 20s.
